data.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger on the Issues
data.text:
VoteMatch Responses

(Click here for VoteMatch quiz) VoteMatch Question & Answer

(Click on question for explanation and background) Based on these stances:

(Click on topic for excerpt & citation) Favors topic 1:Abortion is a woman's unrestricted right

(+2 points on Social scale) State funding for stem cell research, despite Bush ban: Favors topic 1

Pro-choice but no partial-birth abortion: Favors topic 1

Supports current family planning programs: Strongly Favors topic 1

Opposes partial birth abortion: Opposes topic 1

Supports parental notification, with limits: Opposes topic 1

Pro-choice; not a cultural conservative: Favors topic 1 Favors topic 2:Legally require hiring women & minorities

(-3 points on Economic scale) Eliminate racial inequality in employment: Strongly Favors topic 2

Advisor to US English, an anti-bilingual organization: Opposes topic 2 Favors topic 3:Comfortable with same-sex marriage

(+2 points on Social scale) Gay marriage should be between a man and a woman: Opposes topic 3

Changed bodybuilding culture from gay to straight: Favors topic 3

2004: override San Francisco gay marriages with state ruling: Strongly Opposes topic 3

Rated D by National Review on pro-gay issues: Opposes topic 3

Expand civil right act to cover orientation & gender: Strongly Favors topic 3

Domestic partnership but not gay marriage: Favors topic 3

Supports gay rights, including adoption rights: Strongly Favors topic 3 No opinion on topic 4:Keep God in the public sphere

(0 points on Social scale) Supports school prayer: Strongly Favors topic 4

In land of opportunity, millions are left behind: Strongly Opposes topic 4 Strongly Favors topic 5:Expand ObamaCare

(-5 points on Economic scale) Discount drugs to 6 million low-income Californians: Favors topic 5

Must insure the low-income families, especially the children: Strongly Favors topic 5

Tax credits for those without employee health insurance: Strongly Favors topic 5

$350 billion for prescriptions for poor seniors: Favors topic 5

3.2% funding increase for National Institutes of Health: Strongly Favors topic 5 Strongly Favors topic 6:Privatize Social Security

(+5 points on Economic scale) 2005: privatize public employee pensions: Strongly Favors topic 6 Favors topic 7:Vouchers for school choice

(+2 points on Economic scale) Until now, children were trapped in low-performing schools: Favors topic 7

Until now, children were trapped in low-performing schools: Strongly Favors topic 7

Measure student progress and school progress: Favors topic 7

Supports public school choice and community control: Opposes topic 7

Supports limited school vouchers: Favors topic 7

Participate in federal program Race to the Top: Favors topic 7 Opposes topic 8:Fight EPA regulatory over-reach

(+2 points on Social scale) Global Warming Solutions: cut greenhouse gas by 25% by 2020: Strongly Opposes topic 8

Improve our economy without impairing our environment: Favors topic 8

Supports grants for brownfields remediation: Strongly Opposes topic 8 Strongly Favors topic 9:Stricter punishment reduces crime

(-5 points on Social scale) Allow private prisons to compete, to spend less on prisons: Opposes topic 9

Ban motorists from holding cell phones while driving: Favors topic 9

Tookie Williams insufficiently remorseful; so execution on: Strongly Favors topic 9

Death penalty is a necessary and effective deterrent: Strongly Favors topic 9

Keep Three Strikes law: Strongly Favors topic 9 Opposes topic 10:Absolute right to gun ownership

(-3 points on Economic scale) Strong supporter of the second amendment: Strongly Favors topic 10

Support Brady Bill; assault weapon ban; safety locks: Strongly Opposes topic 10

Close the gun show loophole: Opposes topic 10

Im for gun control; Im a peace-loving guy: Opposes topic 10 Opposes topic 11:Higher taxes on the wealthy

(+2 points on Economic scale) Our economy is 21st century & our tax system is 20th century: Favors topic 11

Impose constitutional limit on spending and balanced budget: Opposes topic 11

Californians are overtaxed; find a better way: Strongly Opposes topic 11

Pledges against raising taxes, except in emergencies: Strongly Opposes topic 11

Rescind the car tax; believes in lower taxes: Opposes topic 11

$12B in federal economic stimulus as state block grants: Favors topic 11 Opposes topic 12:Pathway to citizenship for illegal aliens

(-3 points on Social scale) Voted for Prop. 187 in 1994; apologized for it in 2006: Favors topic 12

1983 naturalization was "realization of my dream": Favors topic 12

Against giving drivers licenses to illegal immigrants: Opposes topic 12

Against giving drivers licenses to illegal immigrants: Opposes topic 12

Restrict illegal immigrant rights-theyre a security risk: Strongly Opposes topic 12

Voted for Prop. 187, denying services to illegal immigrants: Opposes topic 12

Address undocumented immigrants living underground: Favors topic 12

No drivers licenses to illegal aliens: Opposes topic 12 Favors topic 13:Support & expand free trade

(+2 points on Economic scale) Promote the Andean Free Trade Agreement: Strongly Favors topic 13

Declined state commitment to CAFTA: Opposes topic 13 Favors topic 14:Support American Exceptionalism

(+2 points on Economic scale) You dont reason with terrorists, you defeat them: Favors topic 14 No opinion on topic 15:Expand the military

(0 points on Social scale) (No votes on which to base response) Strongly Favors topic 16:Make voter registration easier

(+5 points on Social scale) Supreme Court should disallow partisan gerrymandering: Strongly Favors topic 16

2004: Self-financed campaign; no special interest money: Favors topic 16 No opinion on topic 17:Avoid foreign entanglements

(0 points on Social scale) (No votes on which to base response) Strongly Favors topic 18:Prioritize green energy

(-5 points on Economic scale) The future is sustainable green energy: Strongly Favors topic 18

Cut greenhouse gas emissions to 1990 levels by 2020: Strongly Favors topic 18

Improve our economy without impairing our environment: Favors topic 18

Override federal exemption of new air pollution sources: Favors topic 18

Promote watershed management to clean up bays and rivers: Favors topic 18

Calls himself an environmentalist but drives a Humvee: Opposes topic 18

Make EPA into a Cabinet department: Strongly Favors topic 18

Set goal of 25% renewable energy by 2025: Strongly Favors topic 18 Opposes topic 19:Marijuana is a gateway drug

(+2 points on Social scale) Admitted to marijuana usage, but no hard drugs: Opposes topic 19

No legalization except for the medicinal use of marijuana: Opposes topic 19
